TopicTitle: I Kraking love rockets! (Someone please make a better one)

Articles.Content:
I Kraking love rockets

Can you even imagine

Way back in the past when

We thought the sky was just a

backdrop scene

you'd reach on top of a mountain

and yeah, I like a good story

but eventually it's gonna bore me

If it doesn't have that kersploof

That incontrovertable, testable, repeatable poof

I kraking love rockets

And I kracking love Gene Kerman

Cause I don't think it's punk to question what you're told

If you're told the ships just a piece of junk

There's nothing here to argue against

It's a neccesity not a special interest

And I Kraking love rockets

Sometimes people ask me

Of all of the centuries

Which I'd pick to live life in

Well that's pretty easy

Right now. If you think objectively

If you like your GPS

And memory foam beds

And TV shows and cell phones

Even though some are dead...

You kraking love rockets

And I kraking love 'von Kerman

Cause I think it's fly to look up in the sky

And never ever ever stop wondering why

There's nothing here to argue against

It's a neccessity not a special interest

And I kraking love rockets

Spaceship spaceprobes apollo

Your TV set, the Internet

Your RAPIER for supersonic jets

Exoplanets, galaxies

GPS, wormhole theory, relativity

Just take a sec to think about it

How screwed we would be without it

I kraking love rockets

And I love HarvestR

Cause I wanna die remembering why

experiments' more important than fingers or pride

There's nothing here to argue against

It's a neccessity not a special interest

And I Kraking love rockets!
